oshi.json

Class SystemInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • oshi.json.json.AbstractOshiJsonObject
      • oshi.json.SystemInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, OshiJsonObject

    public class SystemInfo
extends AbstractOshiJsonObject
implements OshiJsonObject
    System information. This is the main entry point to Oshi. This object provides getters which instantiate the appropriate platform-specific implementations of OperatingSystem (software) and HardwareAbstractionLayer (hardware).
    Author:
    dblock[at]dblock[dot]org
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • toJSON

        public javax.json.JsonObject toJSON(Properties properties)
        Returns this object as a JsonObject. The provided properties will be set on this object to configure the type of information returned using this and future invocations of OshiJsonObject.toJSON().
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
